name: Rathma's Ribcage Plate
flavorText: Mendeln declared that all priests would display bones in their armor as symbols of their mastery over death.
flavorTextHtml: Mendeln declared that all priests would display bones in their armor as symbols of their mastery over death.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Your permanent minions reduce the cooldown of Army of the Dead by 0.50 seconds each time they deal damage. Your skeletal warriors spawn faster, and your revived minions no longer expire.(4) Set:     
 Your minions no longer take damage. You gain 1% damage reduction for 15 seconds each time one of your minions deal damage. Max 75 stacks.(6) Set:     
 Each permanent active minion increases the damage of Army of the Dead by 500%, up to 9,000%.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Your permanent minions reduce the cooldown of Army of the Dead by 0.50 seconds each time they deal damage. Your skeletal warriors spawn faster, and your revived minions no longer expire.
(4) Set:
Your minions no longer take damage. You gain 1% damage reduction for 15 seconds each time one of your minions deal damage. Max 75 stacks.
(6) Set:
Each permanent active minion increases the damage of Army of the Dead by 500%, up to 9,000%.
